column1: '''''The Poetry of J.R.R. Tolkien''''' is booklet by George Burke Johnston, containing an essay about [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s poetry. The essay features a reprint of Tolkien's poem "[[The Root of the Boot]]" (pages 10-11) which was first published in ''[[Songs for the Philologists]]''. Burke Johnston's essay is a slightly revised version of that published in ''[[The Tolkien Papers]]''.

The booklet was not intended for sale, and was privately circulated by Burke Johnston. A "specially printed, specially bound copy of the booklet" was sent to Tolkien, who [[Letter to George Burke Johnston
